replies.body:
Rat-ta-tat-tat is a way better name than spray and pray.

Edit: Your hatred makes me stronger.
No. It's not.
Spray and Pray was hilarious and clever! Rat-ta-tat-tat is like... well... eh... rat... ha... meh...

Rat-ta-tat-tat from Spray and Pray almost seems like it is purely to make LCS casters sound hilarious while announcing. Maybe it's just me, but Twitch is a common champion in high-ranked competitive play and the new R is going to sound very comical when said quickly
INB4 Grand Skyfall is officially changed to Mandrop.
People are still going to say Spray and Pray
I like it, but yeah, I find that spray and pray sounds better XD

3 hours and 262 people like the old name better.
Rito pls.
Spray and Pray? Guess what. Twitch CAN miss secondary targets with this ability. Makes a lot more sense and is easier to say (and more clever) than Rat-ta-tat-tat. Rat. Pun. Yay? Eh. Boo.

Finally Riot! "Bots now have a 50% chance of playing Blue-side in Co-op vs. AI, with players on Purple-side" Best thing to ever to help players practice for a more "Human" Co-op vs. Ai playing experience.
To really capture a more "Human" Co-op vs. AI playing experience, I think the bots should /all chat the human team to report their teamates for feeding.{{champion:1}} {{champion:25}}
Should we also add intentional AFKing while we are at it?

Makes it so much more fun when u have 2 afks in a bot game. U get a mildly challenging game then instead of just murdering bots for their bad poke exchange, positioning, etc. And the targeting system they use hahaha. Weakest opponent dies first while 28-0 kat is murdering them
Actually, when a player AFK's, a bot does too.  It's funny because when you're killing their Nexus, lvl 1 Trundle bot runs off base to save the day.
I dont think so. Bots are there to help players get better and use different strategies. If players are feeding then they it shouldnt matter because they are there for pratice. {{champion:17}}
He was clearly joking
It will forever be "spray and pray" in our hearts. {{champion:29}}
wait that is the old icon

I want to hear the announcers call out the **rat-at-tat-tat**
Priceless
ITS TWITCH WITH THE FIVE MAN RATATATATTATTAATTA
i was gonna say the same thing
imagine the EU casters saying it

"Old Kassadin could survive by blowing up targets (dead targets don't deal damage)"
{{champion:17}}

I'm just glad that Poro lived
Kassadin? What's that? I heard he used to be a champion...
What's a Yorick?
That one guy in Hamlet.
A dead champion that doesn't deal damage
{{champion:3}} Whats this weird icon I found in the champions?
Ikr, hey let's take away all of Kassadin's damage and ability to shut down mages and give him some crappy magic damage shield. If I want a magic damage shield I'll play morg, hers blocks cc.
Rip Wriggle's Lantern It was a fun 2 week.
It's still good... it's a reasonnable nerf, stop crying.
